tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrencies (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
	price DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
	market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2) NOT NULL,
	volume_24h DECIMAL(20, 2) NOT NULL,
	percent_change_1h DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
	percent_change_24h DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
	percent_change_7d DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrencies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2),
    price DECIMAL(20, 8),
    volume DECIMAL(30, 2),
    change_percent DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    tx_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    currency_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(20, 2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (currency_id) REFERENCES cryptocurrencies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrencies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE price_fluctuations (
    fluctuation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crypto_id INT REFERENCES cryptocurrencies(id),
    fluctuation_date DATE NOT NULL,
    price_before DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    price_after DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cryptocurrency_id INT REFERENCES cryptocurrencies(id),
  date DATE,
  price FLOAT,
  volume FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrencies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    price DECIMAL(18, 2),
    market_cap DECIMAL(18, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crypto_id INT,
    exchange_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    crypto_id INT,
    date DATE,
    high_price DECIMAL(18, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(18, 2),
    volume INT
);
